weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
🌨️ You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ People use me to build snowmen.

weather.question: I'm big and yellow and hot. I give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I live in the sky.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌼 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I fall. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Puddles form when I appear.
☔ I can help plants grow.
🌧️ Some people like to dance in me.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make the leaves dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ Kites fly because of me.
💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.

weather.question: I'm a white fluffy thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like cotton candy.
☁️ I float high above you.
🌧️ Sometimes I am dark and full of water.

weather.question: I'm a flash of light followed by a loud bang. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I appear during a storm.
⛈️ You should stay inside when I am around.
🌩️ I can be dangerous.

weather.question: I come after lightning and sound like a big boom. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I'm very loud!
⛈️ I happen during a storm.
⚡ I follow a flash of light.

weather.question: I'm water that falls from the sky, but I'm frozen like tiny balls. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
🌦️ I fall during a storm.
🎾 I am small, round and hard.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc in the sky that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
✨ Some people believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I'm a very strong storm with winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can cause a lot of damage.
💨 You should take shelter when I'm nearby.
🌪️ Houses are destroyed in movies about me.

bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I’m small and sometimes like to climb a wall. What am I?

hints.text: 🔎 Think of something tiny that scurries around.
🚶I have more legs than you do!
🏡 Sometimes you find me in your house.

bug.question: I can fly and love sweet flowers. I help make honey for hours and hours! What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like to visit colorful gardens.
🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🍯 People eat what I make!

bug.question: I am a bug that is often red, with black spots all over instead. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have round markings on my back.
🐞 I am considered lucky by some.
🌱 I eat tiny bugs that harm plants

bug.question: I jump and hop all day long. I’m green and sing a happy song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Some animals eat me.
🌱 I like to live in grassy fields.
🎵 I make a chirping noise.

bug.question: I start as a worm and then make a case. Later I fly with beauty and grace. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change in my life.
🌈 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I used to be a caterpillar

bug.question: I light up the night, a twinkling spark. I’m a beetle that shines in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow when it's dark.
🔦 I can help you see in the dark.
💡 My light is made in my body.

bug.question: I dig in the ground and build my home. I work with my friends, never alone. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in a colony underground.
💪 We work together to carry things.
🐜 I am very small, but very strong.

bug.question: I float on the water, a bug on a pad. I eat smaller bugs, which makes other bugs sad. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live on top of the water.
🍃 I walk on lily pads.
⛸️ I am like a tiny skater.

bug.question: I make a sticky web, a trap to ensnare. I have eight legs and give people a scare! What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build a home to catch my food.
🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🕸️ My home is made of silk.

bug.question: I buzz around your head, and like to bite. I drink your blood, day and night. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be very annoying in the summer.
💉 I have a long nose to get my food.
😡 People try to swat me away.
